item.title: Edge co-occurrences can account for rapid categorization of natural versus animal images
item.description: Retinal cell preference for natural-like stimuli. Very elegant work by @APalacio_s et al. #retina #neuroscience #decoding https://t.co/3xNWaZd5x6 — Andres Canales-Johnson (@canalesjohnson) February 4, 2019
